name: World War Weird - Story Generator
description:
I seem to have failed to make a 'game' for this gamejam, but I made a fun map-gen and history-gen tool which is heavily inspired by Dwarf Fortress's Legends Mode.

Click around the map to see what happened there or geographical information, you can also click "History" to read the whole history of the island. I've included a New Story button for convenience, but be warned - there is no undo button and your island and all its events will be lost.

Made for Godot Rumble #0~

This is more of a starting off point for a real game - so maybe I'll work on this more in the future. Just add some simple 4X or tactics components.

Design and programming by delphonso.

Music by the excellent Parker Walker who, in a fit of creative madness sat down for an hour and a half and made the background track.

Special shoutout to candlelocks for help with mapgen.
